privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes the information collected by 星遇 (Hoshimeet), how that information may be used, with whom it may be shared, and your choices about such uses and disclosures. By using Kosmeet, you agree to the practices set forth in this Policy.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.description1: When you register with Kosmeet, you provide:
items1: Account Information: Email, password, username or real name
Profile Information: Photos, bio, gender, gender preference
Birth Data: Date, time, and place of birth (for Ba Zi analysis)
Payment Information: Processed securely through Apple Pay or Google Pay
Government ID: If you choose to verify your identity, you may provide a copy of your government-issued ID
section1.description2: If you sign in using Google, we receive:
items2: Your name, email address, and profile photo from Google
We only access information you authorize through Google's permission system
section1.description3: When you use Kosmeet, we automatically collect:
items3: Device Information: Device type, OS, unique identifiers, advertising ID, IP address
Location Data: GPS location (with your permission)
Usage Information: Features accessed, profiles viewed, matches made, time spent
Log Data: Access times, pages viewed, app crashes, system activity
Communications: Messages exchanged with other users
items4: Data from Other Users: Reports or queries involving you submitted by other users
Survey and Research Data: Your responses when you participate in surveys or studies
Referral Data: Contact information of friends you invite to Kosmeet

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.description: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
items: Provide Our Services: Create your account, facilitate matches based on Ba Zi and MBTI compatibility, enable communication (Legal basis: Contract)
Personalize Your Experience: Generate your Ba Zi chart and provide compatibility insights (Legal basis: Contract)
Improve Our Services: Analyze trends, usage patterns, and conduct research (Legal basis: Legitimate interest)
Customer Support: Respond to your questions and provide assistance (Legal basis: Contract)
Safety and Security: Prevent fraud, investigate violations, verify identity (Legal basis: Legitimate interest, Legal obligation)
Communications: Send service notices, updates, and security alerts (Legal basis: Contract)
Marketing: Send promotional communications with your consent (Legal basis: Consent)
Legal Compliance: Comply with applicable laws and regulations (Legal basis: Legal obligation)

section3.title: 3. How We Share Your Information
section3.description: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information:
items: With Other Users: Your profile and compatibility scores are visible to facilitate matching. If someone reports you, we may inform them of actions taken.
With Service Providers: Firebase (authentication, database, analytics), Apple/Google (payment processing)
For Legal Reasons: When required by law, to investigate illegal activity, or to protect safety
Business Transfers: In connection with mergers, acquisitions, or asset sales

section4.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section4.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve our services:
items: Essential Cookies: Remember your login status and preferences
Analytics Cookies: Understand how our service is used and identify improvements
Functional Cookies: Remember your settings and personalize your experience
Third-Party Cookies: Our service providers (such as Firebase) may place cookies to analyze usage
section4.choices: You can control cookies through your browser or device settings. You can reset your device's advertising identifier in your device settings. Disabling cookies may affect some functionality.
section4.doNotTrack: We currently do not respond to 'Do Not Track' signals as there is no industry standard for handling them.

section5.title: 5. Data Storage and Security
section5.description: Your information is stored on secure servers provided by Firebase (Google Cloud). We implement appropriate security measures including:
items: Encryption of data in transit (TLS/SSL) and at rest
Secure authentication through Firebase Auth
Regular security assessments and monitoring
Access controls limiting who can access your data
section5.disclaimer: However, no method of transmission is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.

section6.title: 6. Data Retention
section6.description: We retain your information while your account is active.
section6.inactive: Inactive Accounts: If you do not use Kosmeet for one (1) year, we will automatically close your account.
items: Profile and personal data: 90 days (safety retention window to investigate harmful conduct)
Transaction data: 10 years (tax and accounting requirements)
Customer support records: 6 years
Consent records: 5 years (evidence of compliance)
Traffic logs: 1 year (legal requirements)
section6.banned: If your account is banned, we retain data necessary to prevent you from creating a new account to ensure community safety.

section7.title: 7. Your Rights and Choices
section7.description: Depending on your location, you have the right to:
items: Access and download your personal information
Update or correct your profile information
Delete your account at any time
Withdraw consent for data processing
Object to or restrict certain processing
Disable location services through device settings
Opt out of push notifications
section7.exercise: To exercise these rights, contact us at: hoshimeet{'@'}gmail.com
section7.appeal: Appeal Process: If we deny your privacy request, you may appeal by emailing us with the subject line 'Privacy Request Appeal'. We will review and respond within a reasonable timeframe.
section7.complaints: UK/EEA users may lodge complaints with their local data protection authority (UK: ico.org.uk, EEA: edpb.europa.eu).

section8.title: 8. Age Restriction
section8.description: Kosmeet is intended for users 18 years of age or older. We do not permit individuals under 18 on our platform. If you suspect a member is under 18, please report them using the reporting feature in the app.

section9.title: 9. International Data Transfers
section9.description: Your information may be transferred to and processed in Taiwan and other countries where our servers are located. By using Kosmeet, you consent to this transfer. Where required by law, we use appropriate safeguards such as Standard Contractual Clauses.

section10.title: 10. Region-Specific Rights
section10.california: California Residents (CCPA/CPRA): You have the right to know, access, delete, and correct your personal information. You may opt out of the 'sale' of personal information (we do not sell your data). Contact us to exercise these rights.
section10.uk: UK Residents (UK GDPR): You have additional rights as described in Section 7, including the right to lodge a complaint with the ICO.
section10.other: Residents of Canada, Japan, Korea, Singapore, and Taiwan have rights under their respective data protection laws, including rights to access, correct, and delete personal data.

section11.title: 11. Cookies Policy
section11.description: For detailed information about how we use cookies, please see Section 4 above. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

section12.title: 12. Third-Party Links
section12.description: Kosmeet may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for their privacy practices. We encourage you to read their privacy policies.

section13.title: 13. Children's Privacy
section13.description: Kosmeet is not directed to children under 18. We do not knowingly collect information from children. If you believe a child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.

section14.title: 14. Changes to This Policy
section14.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make material changes, we will notify you through the app or by email before the changes take effect.

section15.title: 15. Contact Us
section15.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
